subject: Super Bowl
Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: Mr. Erhardt, a coordinator for the Giants 1986 and 1990 N.F.L. championship teams under Bill Parcells, is dead at 81.
snippet: Mr. Erhardt, a coordinator for the Giants 1986 and 1990 N.F.L. championship teams under Bill Parcells, is dead at 81.
